vocab.def: E-hand shake / number sign; pair with urgent NMM.
Status terms; localize and show severity.
Where the event is; use landmarks if no exact address.

sections.heading: Warm-Up: Urgent Report Frame
sections.body: Drill a 4-part emergency frame in **3‚Äì5 sign** clauses: **WHAT** (ACCIDENT/FALL/CRASH), **WHERE** (ADDRESS/NEAR LANDMARK), **WHO** (ADULT/CHILD/SELF), **SEVERITY** (BLEED/UNCONSCIOUS/BREATH PROBLEM).

microCheck.q: Best base order for an emergency report:

sections.heading: Model: Call + Interpreter Request

media.caption: Time-first if helpful; keep clauses short

sections.body:
Example:
‚Ä¢ **EMERGENCY NOW.** **CRASH STREET NEAR SCHOOL.** **ADULT BLEED ARM STRONG.**
‚Ä¢ **INTERPRETER PLEASE.**
‚Ä¢ **DISPATCH (RS):** **AMBULANCE 5-MIN. APPLY PRESSURE.**
‚Ä¢ **CALLER (repeat-back):** **OK APPLY PRESSURE. 5-MIN.** Return to neutral between RS lines.

microCheck.q: What proves the caller understood dispatcher instructions?

sections.heading: Triage Signs & NMM
sections.body:
Prioritize life threats:
‚Ä¢ **BREATH OK?/NOT** (Y/N face)
‚Ä¢ **BLEED WHERE? HOW-MUCH?** (WH + amount NMM)
‚Ä¢ **CONSCIOUS?** (Y/N)
Use urgent NMM during the problem, then **release** to neutral when stabilized.

callouts.title: One Urgent Thing at a Time
callouts.body: Short clauses beat run-ons. Solve **breathing** before **bleeding** if necessary and sign it in order.

sections.heading: Handoff: EMT Arrives
sections.body:
Handoff template:
‚Ä¢ **WHAT:** **FALL STAIRS.**
‚Ä¢ **WHO:** **ADULT FEMALE.**
‚Ä¢ **SEVERITY:** **HURT ANKLE STRONG. BLEED LITTLE HAND.**
‚Ä¢ **HISTORY:** **ALLERGY PENICILLIN. ASTHMA.**
‚Ä¢ **ACTIONS DONE:** **ICE, BANDAGE, APPLY PRESSURE.**

microCheck.q: Which detail is MOST critical for EMT handoff?

sections.heading: Partner Practice: Call ‚Üí Handoff
sections.body: A = caller, B = dispatcher. Do **call with interpreter request** + instruction **repeat-back**. Swap; then A = patient, B = EMT for **handoff** using the template. Keep every line 3‚Äì5 signs.

sections.heading: Mini-Showcase
sections.body: Record **18‚Äì25s**: **Call snippet (WHAT/WHERE/WHO/SEVERITY + interpreter request + repeat-back)** then **EMT handoff** (include **allergies or meds**).
sections.teacherNote: Caption: incident, location, one severity item, and any allergy/condition disclosed.
